• Data Manipulation: Proficiency in Pandas and NumPy for data analysis and processingVisualization: Experience with Plotly for interactive visualizations and Dash for web application developmentWeb Requests: Familiarity with requests library for API interactions and data collectionMachine Learning: Hands-on experience with Scikit-Learn for traditional ML algorithmsTime Series: Experience with Prophet for forecasting and time series analysisDeep Learning: Basic familiarity with PyTorch for neural network development (preferred) Version Control: Experience with GitHub for code management and collaborationCloud Platforms: Familiarity with Amazon Web Services (AWS) or equivalent cloud platformsContainerization: Basic understanding of Docker, Docker-Compose, and Docker Desktop for development environmentsAPIs: General API usage experience for data integration and external service connectivityDatabases: Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL and TimescaleDB for time-series data management Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Science, Machine Learning, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, or related quantitative fieldStrong academic project portfolio demonstrating practical application of data science techniquesPrevious work experience (any industry) showing reliability, teamwork, and professional communication skillsDemonstrated experience with large dataset analysis and processing (academic or personal projects) Experience with supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniquesUnderstanding of time series analysis and forecasting methodsAbility to design experiments and A/B tests to validate hypothesesStrong mathematical foundation in linear algebra, calculus, and statisticsExperience processing and analyzing large datasets (200+ GB scale preferred) Python: Proficiency in Python > 3.
• 10 for data analysis, machine learning, and web application developmentSQL: Strong SQL skills for database querying, data extraction, and analysisCSS: Basic CSS knowledge for dashboard styling and web interface customization Create interactive dashboards and visualizations to present complex data insights to technical and non-technical stakeholdersDevelop time-series analysis for performance trends, vehicle dynamics, and operational metricsSupport race weekend analytics with real-time data processing and visualizationGenerate analytical reports for Technical Director, Director of Competition, and race team personnel Work closely with DevOps engineers, senior data scientists, and race teamsParticipate in cross-functional projects with IT, Engineering, and Racing Operations teamsContribute to the evaluation and integration of new analytical tools and technologies.
